note.p: Birth: Family residence at Kinnordy, near Kirriemuir, Forfarshire, Scotland (14 November 1797)
Death: His house at 53 Harley Street, London (22 February 1875)
Burial: Nave of Westminster Abbey, London
Research Field: Geology, evolutionary biology
Education: Oxford; Lincoln's Inn
Career: Called to the Bar (1825); first Professor of Geology, King's College London (1831- resignation in 1833)
Honours: Kt 1848; Bt 1864
Memberships: FGS; FLS; Athenaeum
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 2/02/1826
Medals/Prizes: Royal Medal 1834; Copley Medal 1858
Lectures: Bakerian 1835
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1876-1877 vol 25 pp xi-xiv signed by A G
